price: Rárá (kò rí bí wọ́n ṣe rò ó. al-Ƙur’ān), òhun ni àwọn āyah tó yanjú nínú igbá-àyà àwọn tí A fún ní ìmọ̀-ẹ̀sìn. Kò sì sí ẹni tó ń tako àwọn āyah Wa àfi àwọn alábòsí.
arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: bal huwa āyātun bayyinātun fī ṣudūri alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wamā yajḥadu biāyātinā illā al-ẓālimūna
